item.description:
I encourage you to attend the whole event, starting at 9am.
Admission is Free, but
REGISTRATION IS REQUIRED.

We'll meet at 2pm, after the main events end. (I'll pick a spot on site and post signs.)

This is a day for homeowners, builders and designers
Saturday, March 24, 2007 9:00 am ? 3:00 pm
Ipswich Performing Arts Center
General Admission is FREE, but seating is limited.
Full Event Details here.

- How We Can Cut Our Emissions 75% and Save the Climate: The 3% Solution
- Best Practices in Home Energy Efficiency: Setting Priorities and Calculating Returns
- Technical Workshops
- Open Clinic
item.name: Meetup at Home Energy Festival - Ipswitch
